entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: Astro Gold
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • Gold Annual：USD 59.99 → USD 39.99 [USD 39.99 ~ USD 59.99]

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Gold Annual：USD 39.99
  • Gold Monthly：USD 7.99
  • Gold Level lifetime：USD 79.99
  • Gold Level Free Trial：USD 0.00
  • Lunar Return Report：USD 3.99
  • 7-day Trial Astrolocality：USD 0.00
  • Astrolocality Maps：USD 24.99
  • The Big Three Report：USD 3.99
  • Relationship Report：USD 3.99
  • Predictive Report - Untimed：USD 2.99

应用描述

Astro Gold for iOS – A Professional Astrology Tool Astro Gold is a mobile astrology application designed for both beginner and professional astrologers. It provides accurate chart calculations, interpretation features, and a range of display and customization options. Chart data can be saved locally or to iCloud Drive for access across iOS and macOS versions of Astro Gold. FREE FEATURES The app can be downloaded and used at no cost with access to the following core features: * Create and view natal charts and transit charts * Display zoomable, high-resolution single, bi or tri chart wheels and single or bi aspect grids * Print or sharing chartwheel images * View listings showing planetary placements, aspects and astrological symbol meanings * Read basic interpretation text for sign, house placements and aspects within a natal chart or transits chart * Save and open chart files locally or in iCloud Drive * Import and export chart files (compatible with Astro Gold macOS) * Customize chart display settings * Use zoomable, high-resolution wheels and basic listings * Display widgets showing a natal or transits chartwheel GOLD LEVEL FEATURES These additional features are available via a one-off lifetime in-app purchase or else via a subscription. There is also a no-commitment 7 day free trial option available. * Progressed, directed, solar return, lunar return, and composite charts * Additional advanced listings - Essential Dignities, Midpoint Sort * Dynamic (predictive) listings features, with transits, progressions and directions and many configuration options * Full chart file management and editing tools * Expanded settings for orbs, chart points, zodiacs, and house systems * Display widgets with lunar, inner or outer planets transits listings to a natal chart PRO REPORTS Professional, illustrated, astrology reports are also optionally available as additional in-app purchases, on a per-report basis. They are generated in PDF format, shareable and printable. * Birth Chart Report * Child Report * Relationship Report * Predictive Report (12 months) * The Big Three Report (Sun, Moon, Ascendant) * Birthday Report (Solar Return) * Lunar Return * Pet Report TECHNICAL DETAILS * Uses Swiss Ephemeris for precise astronomical calculations * Includes ACS Atlas with over 250,000 locations and historical time zone data * Supports many house systems and sidereal zodiacs * Charts are calculated accurately from 1200 BCE to 2400 CE * Charts saved to iCloud Drive can be accessed on multiple iOS devices and in the Astro Gold app for macOS Terms of Use - https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

应用截屏

iPad

entry.title: 我的足跡: GPS記錄儀
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 0.99 → 免費 [免費 ~ USD 0.99]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • 300次高精度海拔：USD 3.99
  • 100次高精度海拔查詢：USD 2.99
  • 終身高級版：USD 9.99

应用描述

我的足跡MyTracks是一個使用GPS數據來追蹤您位置的應用程式。它非常適合各種活動，如徒步旅行、慢跑、散步、騎自行車等等。這款應用程式利用先進的技術提供精確的測量和計算。 以下是您可以使用MyTracks進行的操作： 追蹤您的路線：無論是徒步旅行、慢跑還是騎行，MyTracks都能夠記錄您的路徑並在地圖上顯示。 保存喜愛的位置：如果有特定地點您想要記住，您可以在應用程式中將其標記為喜愛的位置。 匯入和匯出數據：MyTracks允許您以CSV、GPX、KML和KMZ等多種格式匯入和匯出數據。 提高準確性：您可以進行靜態GPS觀測，以獲得更準確的路標。 輕鬆導航：該應用程式在指南針上提供路標導航，讓您輕鬆導航到指定位置。 可自訂的路標：您可以手動添加路標，或從喜愛的位置中導入路標。您甚至可以添加具有角度和距離的向量。 座標轉換：MyTracks允許您隨時在四種不同座標格式（十進制、度分秒、MGRS、UTM）之間進行轉換。 其他功能：該應用程式在錄製過程中顯示滑翔比，提供度數或千分度的指南針選項，支援地圖上的MGRS網格疊加，並允許您在開始追蹤之前創建路線。 詳細記錄：您可以在地圖上查看您的追蹤軌跡並重播路線。該應用程式提供有關您的軌跡的詳細統計信息，並顯示與每個追蹤相關的已保存路標。您還可以更改追蹤的顏色以便更容易識別。 請注意，持續在背景使用GPS會快速耗盡設備的電池。如果您喜歡我們的應用，請分享好友給予我們支持！如果您有任何回饋或問題，請隨時透過miaozhi.ai@gmail.com與我們聯繫。

entry.title: IPTV Smart Pro - Live TV
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 4.99 → USD 3.99 [USD 2.99 ~ USD 4.99]）

全部价格信息

价格：USD 3.99

应用描述

Get the New Generation Professional IPTV Smart Player application. Download the new generation professional and AI technology IPTV player now and enjoy unlimited entertainment! Forget all the IPTV applications you know! Download your favorite movies and series, Experience what's happening now! Discover Live TV, Movies, Series, Matches, Football, 4K Broadcast Quality, Multi-Screen Watching Opportunity, Parental Control (Pin Code), Forget Freezing Problems, EPG (Electronic Program Guide), EPG link adding support, M3U Membership Link Adding, Login with Xtream API and many more innovations. The application supports many country languages. You buy the application once and use it for life, there is no monthly or annual payment, it does not contain ads. IPTV Smart Player is a quality and ideal solution for your IPTV needs. It is an advanced IPTV player application with high quality and modern design that allows you to watch high-definition broadcasts easily and in full screen without any lag or freezing problems on your Mac. IPTV Smart Player is the ideal, fully professional new generation live broadcast solution with IPTV, LIVE TV, EPG, VOD, Video, Series, Catch-up, Multi-screen and many more features. Features: - Multi-Language Support - Download Your Favorite Movies and Series - Record Your Live Broadcasts as Video - Add Link Support for EPG (TV Guide) - Built-in EPG (TV program guide) support - Xstream API Support - M3u files and URLs (playlists) - Watch Broadcasts Without Freezing or Stuttering - New Generation Advanced 4K Player - Catch-Up (Catch-up feature allows you to watch programs you missed in a certain time period.) - Channel Favorite Support - Multiple screen options - Unlimited user addition - Multi-language support - Channel Search - New modern layout/UI design - Smooth and fast 4K Streaming (Depending on IPTV service provider) - Parental Control (PIN) - Playing local audio/video files - Adding External Players - Built-in speed test function - Dynamic language switching (multilingual) - and much more * No IPTV application offers media content, this is not specific to our application. Users must add their own membership or provide their own content for streaming. * The screenshots shown on this page are for illustrative purposes only and do not refer to an actual video or its content. * IPTV Smart Player is not affiliated with any third-party providers. Legal Disclaimer: https://www.discoverapp.store/disclaimer Privacy Policy: https://www.discoverapp.store/ssv-privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.discoverapp.store/terms-and-conditions Contact: https://www.discoverapp.store/contact

entry.title: 画師牆紙
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 0.49 → USD 0.39 [USD 0.29 ~ USD 0.99]）

全部价格信息

价格：USD 0.39

App 內購買項目

  • buy wallpaper once：USD 0.99
  • become Vip：USD 1.99

应用描述

该应用程序是获取免费高分辨率墙纸的最完美方式, 感谢其独特的设计特点: -100%高清墙纸! -其创新的,前所未有的“上色”功能使您可以根据您所喜欢的颜色对精美的墙纸进行分类。 -您可以搜索到世界上最好最流行的iPhone手机墙纸。 -每周最新的酷图墙纸 -按下“幸运”键,您可以试试您的手气从整个海量的图片集中抽取一张墙纸。 -同时适用于iPhone和iPad. -在您的iPad上,您可以旋转您的装置以便您可在纵式与横向两个格式中预览图片。 -所有的墙纸都可根据类型进行分类:抽象的,自然的,花卉,海洋,天空,动物,海滩,质地等等! 所有最好的高清墙纸! 现在就获取最流行的墙纸!

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad
